articles.author: Reuters Staff
articles.title: Mexico reports 9,187 new coronavirus cases, 303 more deaths - Reuters UK
articles.description: Mexico's health ministry reported on Sunday 9,187 additional cases of the novel coronavirus and 303 more deaths in the country, bringing the official number of cases to 1,041,875 and the death toll to 101,676.
articles.content:

articles.description: Billionaire Microsoft co-founder Bill Gates believes "almost all" the Covid-19 vaccines will work and work well, he said in an interview with CNN's Fareed Zakaria.
